verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Andriamanitra,
mendrika hoderaina Ianao,
Masina masina mandrakizay,
Ianao no iankohofanay,
Asandratray eo aloha;
Tsara Ianao,
Sambatra izahay;

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tsofy, tsofy rano re, Ray,
‘Reto zanakao indray;
Arotsahy ny Fanahy
Amin’ny vahoakanao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Tompo ô,
tahio ‘zao fotoana anio izao
Tsapanay fanatrehanao, ry Ray,
Ahazoanay mijoro
amin’izao finoana izao;
O jereo ‘reto olonao,

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Tsofy, tsofy rano re Ray
‘Reto zanakao indray;
:,: Arotsahy ny Fanahy
Amin’ny vahoakanao :,:
